name: elec
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cec(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c2, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Membership in an equivalence class. Theorem 72 of [Suppes] p. 82. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)
